Package io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.table.annotations

Annotation Interface TableCellLocator

@Retention(RUNTIME) @Target(FIELD) public @interface TableCellLocator
Defines locators for identifying a specific cell within a table. This annotation is applied to fields in a row model class to specify how table cells are located in the UI.

It provides three locators:

  • cellLocator - Identifies the cell in a row.
  • headerCellLocator - Identifies the corresponding column header.
  • cellTextLocator - (Optional) Identifies the text element inside the cell.

The table framework processes this annotation at runtime to extract and interact with table data dynamically.

    Description
    org.openqa.selenium.support.FindBy
    cellLocator
    Locator for identifying the cell within a table row.

  • Optional Element Summary

    Optional Elements
    Modifier and Type
    Optional Element
    Description
    org.openqa.selenium.support.FindBy
    cellTextLocator
    (Optional) Locator for extracting the text content inside the cell.
    org.openqa.selenium.support.FindBy
    headerCellLocator
    Locator for identifying the corresponding column header.
    String
    tableSection
    (Optional) Specifies the table section if the table consists of multiple sections.

  • Element Details

    • cellLocator

      org.openqa.selenium.support.FindBy cellLocator
      Locator for identifying the cell within a table row.
      Returns:
      the FindBy annotation specifying the cell locator.

    • tableSection

      String tableSection
      (Optional) Specifies the table section if the table consists of multiple sections.
      Returns:
      the name of the table section, default is an empty string.
      Default:
      ""

    • cellTextLocator

      org.openqa.selenium.support.FindBy cellTextLocator
      (Optional) Locator for extracting the text content inside the cell. Defaults to the current element.
      Returns:
      the FindBy annotation specifying the text locator.
      Default:
      @org.openqa.selenium.support.FindBy(xpath=".")

    • headerCellLocator

      org.openqa.selenium.support.FindBy headerCellLocator
      Locator for identifying the corresponding column header.
      Returns:
      the FindBy annotation specifying the header locator.
      Default:
      @org.openqa.selenium.support.FindBy(xpath=".")
